alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 9:19PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT YAVAPAI COUNTY THROUGH 1000 PM MST... At 918 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Castle Hot Springs to near Black Canyon City. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rock Springs, Castle Hot Springs, Black Canyon City, Lake Pleasant, and Hazlett Hollow Campground. This includes Interstate 17 between mile markers 242 and 254. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
